summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Franklin Avenue from a point 60' north of the north margin of Nelson Place on the east to a point 180' south of the south margin of East Park Drive on the east, et al., in the City of Seattle by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 21184 creating Local Improvement District No.2090 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
